Template¶

class src.template.Template(name, residues)[source]¶
class Template¶

This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.

name¶

Name of the template

Type:str
residues¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

Type:list of Residue object
pdb¶

PDB filename of the template

Type:str
add_gaps_in_template_sequence()[source]¶

This function replaces the missing residues of the template’s sequence

Returns:Path to the new (gapless) PDB file of the template.
Return type:str
get_fasta_file()[source]¶

Retrieve the full FASTA amino acid sequence (gapless) of the template, and write it to an alignment file.

Returns:Path to the FASTA file containing the sequence of the template.
Return type:str
parse_pdb()[source]¶

Parse the pdb file and set the CA coordinates.

set_pdb_name(metafold_dict)[source]¶

Get the PDB name of the current template from the template’s name.

Parameters:metafold_dict – A dictionary with key = template name and value = pdb file
src.template.build_new_pdb_with_modeller(self, res_path)[source]¶

This function launches MODELLER to rebuild the PDB structures containing missing residues. Some structures have unresolved parts which are consequently not integrated in the PDB file because no coordinates could be determined for the faulty residues. We can use MODELLER to “fill in” these missing residues by treating the original structure (without the missing residues) as a template, and building a comparative model using the full sequence.

Returns:Path to the new (gapless) PDB file of the template.
Return type:str
src.template.write_new_alignment(self, res_path)[source]¶

This function launches MODELLER to rebuild the PDB structures containing missing residues. Some structures have unresolved parts which are consequently not integrated in the PDB file because no coordinates could be determined for the faulty residues. We can use MODELLER to “fill in” these missing residues by treating the original structure (without the missing residues) as a template, and building a comparative model using the full sequence.

Returns:Path to the new (gapless) PDB file of the template.
Return type:str
